#summary Aardwolf Stats MiniWindow
#labels Author-Bast

=== Table of Contents ===
<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =
 * Author: Bast
 * shows a miniwindow that shows stats

= Installation ==
 * Required 
  * [miniwin] and its dependencies
  * [pluginhelper] and its dependencies
  * [ldplugin]
  * [tablefuncs]
  * Nick's [http://www.gammon.com.au/forum/?id=8776 Stats_Detector.xml] Plugin in the directory <Mushclient Install Dir>\worlds\plugins\Aardwolf (included in the Aardwolf Mushclient)
 * see the [Download] Page, and copy the file into worlds\plugins\Aardwolf

= Troubleshooting =
 * if you do not see the window, "mstat Stats toggle"

= Screenshots =
 http://bastmush.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/stats/stats.png

= Help =
 * "mstat Stats toggle" to toggle the window
 {{{
/*
miniwin_stats v1 Stats Commands
-----------------------------------------------
debug          : toggle debugging
fonts          : show fonts loaded in this miniwin
help           : show help
reset          : reset settings to default values
save           : save plugin variables
set            : set settings
toggle         : toggle window
*/
 }}}
